description: An entrepreneurial team is more open to new ideas and creative in problem solving. This program is designed to expand thinking.
synonyms: Innovation, Creativity, Enthusiasm, Openness, Pushing Boundaries, Expansive Thinking, Ideation, Futurism

description: Make work fun! Create a team environment that is visibly enjoyable. High energy, positive outlooks, and upbeat communication are the goal!
synonyms: Friendly, Supportive Feedback, Positive Outlook, Meaningful Conversation, Depth, Patience, Feedback, Hopeful Collaboration, Turning Negatives into Positives!

description: Creating an environment where everyone feels needed and necessary. Getting along and being helpful are very valuable skills.
synonyms: Transitioning between Home and Work, Low Criticalness, Low Judgement, High Encouragement and Support, Accepting of Uniqueness, Affirmation, Patience & Consistency

description: Go, Go, Go! Create a team environment with productivity at the heart of everything. Quickly decide what matters, and how to get it done.
synonyms: Planning and Preparation, Making Decisions, Decision-Support, Building Followership, Taking Ownership, Taking Risks, Moving Past Failure, Schedule and Task Management

description: Creating an environment that emphasizes best business practices and operating effectiveness.
synonyms: Productivity, Task Management, Accountability, Time Management, Prioritization, Efficiency, Thoroughness, Expectation Management and Quality

description: Creating an environment with fewer mistakes and less hazards. Caution, safety, and quality work are of highest value.
synonyms: Awareness, Preparation, Knowledge of Best Practices, Decision-Making, Reaction vs. Response, Research, Collaboration and Quality Control
